title.value: Economic, legal, institutional and territorial fundamentals of land management
Экономико-правовые и организационно-территориальные основы управления земельными ресурсами

person.name: Mataseva, V.V., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

organization.name: Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: The monograph deals with the problems of land management in terms of development of innovative market economy. Economic, juridical, organizational and territorial foundations of land management are analyzed; main results and characteristics of the economic and legal regulation of land and property relations in the Republic of Belarus are presented. Innovative model of land management in a single governmental system is suggested; property management and the role of cadaster in land management are evaluated. Development of the state system of land management, ecological and economic content of management of land resources, especially land resources as a control object and formation of land administration infrastructure in the Republic of Belarus is substantiated. Concept of construction and operation of the State Land Service along with mechanisms of improvement of land use of agricultural appropriation is developed. Genesis and transformation of land ownership in the context of improving of management of land resources for agricultural purposes, regulation of land and property relations using the tools of public-private partnership is researched. Ecological and economic concept of improving of land management of rural areas is formed, Information Management System of utilization and protection of agricultural lands is offered. Problems of radioactive contamination of agricultural lands as well as methods of remediation of lands contaminated by radiation are enumerated.
